item.title: Pancakes
item.description:
Ingredients

  • 100g plain flour
  • 2 eggs
  • Pinch of salt
  • 300ml milk
  • 1 tsp of sunflower oil

Method

Whisk together until it is a batter Leave for, at least, 30 minutes to rest Then fry - butter pan…

BBC Good Food (“Easy Pancakes”)
